an1.150-169:150.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anāpattiṃ āpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:150.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentī”ti.
an1.150-169:151.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū āpattiṃ anāpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:151.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentī”ti.
an1.150-169:152.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū lahukaṃ āpattiṃ garukā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … garukaṃ āpattiṃ lahukā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ anavasesā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ sāvasesā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ appaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti … pe … appaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ sappaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanaahitāya paṭipannā bahujanaasukhāya, bahuno janassa anatthāya ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:152.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū apuññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ antaradhāpentī”ti.
an1.150-169:160.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū anāpattiṃ anāpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:160.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1.150-169:161.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū āpattiṃ āpattīti dīpenti te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:161.1.2: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
an1.150-169:162.1.1: “Ye te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū lahukaṃ āpattiṃ lahukā āpattīti dīpenti … garukaṃ āpattiṃ garukā āpattīti dīpenti … duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ duṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … aduṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ aduṭṭhullā āpattīti dīpenti … sāvasesaṃ āpattiṃ sāvasesā āpattīti dīpenti … anavasesaṃ āpattiṃ anavasesā āpattīti dīpenti … sappaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ sappaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti … appaṭikammaṃ āpattiṃ appaṭikammā āpattīti dīpenti;
an1.150-169:162.1.2: te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū bahujanahitāya paṭipannā bahujanasukhāya, bahuno janassa atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussānaṃ.
an1.150-169:162.1.3: Bahuñca te, bhikkhave, bhikkhū puññaṃ pasavanti, te cimaṃ saddhammaṃ ṭhapentī”ti.
